project.author: Jo du Plessis
project.notes: THIRSTI Facebook Messenger bot was built in NodeJS, Express & MongoDB. It lets users schedule water reminders & engage with tips. This project is based off of Geronimo.

project.author: Jo du Plessis
project.notes: Geronimo is a NodeJS Facebook Messenger app that translates audio to text using Google Speech & CloudConvert, and then searches a SQL Server database using the transcribed audio.
